#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long n,q,i,p,j;
	cin>>n>>q;
	long a[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>a[i];
	bool smal,big;
	sort(a,a+n);
	while(q--)
	{
		smal=false;
		big=false;
		cin>>p;
		if(n==1)
		{
			if(a[0]==p)
			cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"No"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
	
		if(a[0]<=p&&a[n-1]>=p)
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
